**Responsibilities:**



**Position Description:**



Design and manage multifaceted pre-clinical, clinical and non-clinical efficacy and target animal safety research studies; generate and implement trial protocols; ensure compliance with protocols and regulatory requirements; compile and analyze study data; and write reports for submission to licensing authorities.



**Functions, Duties, Tasks:**



+ Design implement and oversee research programs to accomplish business goals

+ Identify and select Contract Research Organizations (CRO?s) and establish contract agreements, maintain a positive business collaboration

+ Ensure scientific integrity and animal welfare in all activities

+ Direct involvement in discussions with global regulatory authorities in planning and implementation of development programs

+ Author protocols and reports

+ Determine needs and procure necessary study supplies for all studies

+ Coordinate, supervise and/or conduct study activities and collaborator efforts as necessary

+ Proactively search for solutions

+ Work effectively and flexibly within and across all Elanco R&D teams and external collaborators to achieve overall Elanco R&D deliverables

+ Create a positive work environment that is aligned with company objectives

+ Provide and accept challenge to deliver innovative technical solutions and create an innovative culture

+ Identify and utilize methods to deliver individual objectives in a high quality, timely, cost-effective manner

+ Provide information to facilitate accurate and timely project and budget forecasts

+ Manage project timeline and budget deliverables to facilitate delivery of the Elanco pipeline
